title: The Chanting Deepens

features.title: Story Event System
features.description: Modular event system implemented in events.js with trigger, chance, and completed flags. Includes new helper: showStoryEventDialog() for interactive choices.

features.title: New Event: The Faint Chanting
features.description: Triggered upon entering Whispering Glade. Player choice driven by Wisdom stat. Can result in damage or a reward (Mystic Charm).

improvements: log(), renderHud(), and renderInventory() are now exported to support modular systems.
Event structure supports completion checks via this.completed.
Improved modularity and separation of logic between game.js, events.js, and UI.
fixes: Event logic no longer retriggers after being marked complete.
Adjusted modal behavior for story dialog to avoid UI overlap.
